nodes.text: The Arena Grand was the main gladiatorial arena in the Spire, the capital city of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. It featured fights between Zakuulans, off-worlders, creatures and droids that were broadcast as entertainment and source for betting across the Eternal Empire. The current winner of all matches in the arena held the title of the "Eternal Champion". By 3630 BBY, this title was held by Zotar, a Knight of Zakuul.
The Arena Grand appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during the Eternal Championship.
